T02D1755:229b-1: dzny'a n'a gna dzv'a la ho ma bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D1755:229b-3: ye shes kyi me sbar ba zhes bya ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga ;
T02D1755:229b-4: / dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1755:229b-5: gang zhig dran pa'i skad cig gis //
T02D1755:229b-7: bud shing sreg pa'i nag po che //
T02D1755:229b-8: ye shes ma chen la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1755:229b-9: gsal la ma tshang med bsdus pa'i //
T02D1755:229b-10: yang dag rim bzhin bri 'dod pas //
T02D1755:229b-11: ye shes me sbyor zhes brjod pa'i //
T02D1755:229b-12: sbyin sreg cho ga bshad par bya //
T02D1755:229b-13: de la cho ga 'di ni nyin ma bzang po
T02D1755:229b-14: la dpal nag po chen po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan
T02D1755:229b-15: pas sngon du gtor ma byin la /
T02D1755:229b-16: lag pa g-yas pa kha sbub ste brkyang nas rang
T02D1755:229b-17: gis sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa ni kun rdzob
T02D1755:229b-18: yang dag par bya ba'i thabs so //
T02D1755:229b-19: yang na stong pa nyid kyis so //
T02D1755:229b-20: yang na thab khung thams cad bca' ba'i don du
T02D1755:229b-21: sbyang ba'i bye brag dngos grub rin chen 'byung gnas
T02D1755:229b-22: su bshad pa'i cho ga ltar rgyas par sa sbyang
T02D1755:229b-23: ba la sogs pa byas la /
T02D1755:229b-24: sa bdag klu'i lto ba'i kha phyogs su thab khung rnams bca' bar bya ste /
T02D1755:229b-25: de rnams las zhi ba la sa gzhi dkar la snum pa rgyar khru gang zlum po'o //
T02D1755:229b-26: dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa /
T02D1755:229b-27: thab kyi steng du kha khyer la 'phang dang rgyar song bzhi pa'o //
T02D1755:229b-28: kha dog dkar pos byug me tog dkar pos chal bar byas te brgyan no //
T02D1755:230a-0: @230a * // rgyas pa la sa gzhi ser la snum pa rgyar
T02D1755:230a-1: khru do zur brgyad pa rin po che lta bu
T02D1755:230a-2: / dbus su rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che'o //
T02D1755:230a-3: thab kyi steng du kha khyer la 'phang dang rgyar
T02D1755:230a-4: sor brgyad pa kha dog ser pos byug / me
T02D1755:230a-5: tog ser pos chal bar byas te brgyan no //
T02D1755:230a-6: dbang la sa gzhi dmar la 'jam par chos 'byung
T02D1755:230a-7: lta bu rdo rjes mtshan pa la sogs pa zhi
T02D1755:230a-8: ba dang mtshungs pa la kha dog dmar pos byug
T02D1755:230a-9: / me tog dmar pos chal par dgram mo //
T02D1755:230a-10: mngon spyod la sa gzhi ral ba dang cha sgo
T02D1755:230a-11: can dang rtsub la gnag par rgyar khru gang gru
T02D1755:230a-12: bzhi pa'i dbus su padma gnas pa'i steng du khro
T02D1755:230a-13: bo'i rdo rjes mtshan pa dgod /
T02D1755:230a-14: thab khung gi steng kha kyer la 'phang dang rgyar
T02D1755:230a-15: sor bzhi pa phyir kha bltas pa la khro bo'i
T02D1755:230a-17: sa nag po dang dur khrod kyi thal ba dang /
T02D1755:230a-18: bong bu dang rnga mo'o spangs la sogs pa dang
T02D1755:230a-19: bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i chu yis byugs la
T02D1755:230a-20: / dri med pa dang dri mi zhim pa'i me
T02D1755:230a-21: tog sngon po'am nag po'am so ba'am nas kyis bskor
T02D1755:230a-23: 'bar ba'i phreng bas bskor ba'i 'jigs par byed pa
T02D1755:230a-24: dang bcas pa mi'i chil la sogs pa'i mar mes
T02D1755:230a-25: brgyan pa'o // yang na rdul tshon tsam la brten no //
T02D1755:230a-26: 'di ni thab khung gi mtshan nyid bstan pa'o /
T02D1755:230a-28: // / shing p'a la sha'am au dumb'a [*duw'a?] ra la
T02D1755:230a-29: sogs pa 'o ma can gyi steng gi yal ga
T02D1755:230a-30: gsar pa sor bcu gnyis pa mnyam par bcad pa
T02D1755:230a-31: sbom phra mthe'u chung tsam la sbrang rtsi dang 'o
T02D1755:230a-32: ma dang mar la spags pa'i yam shing 'dab ma
T02D1755:230a-34: rtse mo gcig pa ming med dang /
T02D1755:230a-35: mthe bong gis bzung la bsnun no //
T02D1755:230a-36: rul pa dang yon po dang phra ba la sogs pa spang ngo //
T02D1755:230a-37: ku sha til mar la spags pa dang /
T02D1755:230a-46: shing dri zhim po'i khu ba dang /
T02D1755:230a-48: 'bras yos dang 'bras bu skyur po can gyi lo
T02D1755:230a-49: ma rtse mo gnyis ka sbrang dang 'o ma la
T02D1755:230a-50: sbags la / ji lta ba bzhin du zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1755:230a-51: 'dir yang sngon gyi shing rked nga nas skyes pa'i
T02D1755:230a-52: yal ga sbom phra chang bar shong pa khru re
T02D1755:230a-53: ba zho dang 'o mar spags pa'i yam shing dang
T02D1755:230b-0: / 'bras zho dang me tog brgya pa @230b zhe dang spags pa dang /
T02D1755:230b-6: 'bru sna tshogs rnams kyis rgyas pa la'o //
T02D1755:230b-7: zhi ba'i skabs su bshad pa'i shing yon tan dang ldan pa lo ma can sor lnga pa'am /
T02D1755:230b-9: tsam pa ka'i ge sar la sogs pas yam shing ngo //
T02D1755:230b-10: me tog dang 'bras bu dmar la skyur ba rnams kyis dbang la'o //
T02D1755:230b-13: tsher ma dang ldan pa rnams sam /
T02D1755:230b-14: ro bsregs pa'i shing gses pa sor bcu pa rtsa ba'i phyogs nas bzung ste /
T02D1755:230b-15: dug dang khrag dang til gyis spags pa rtse mo rno ba dang ldan pa yam shing ngo //
T02D1755:230b-22: ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang /
T02D1755:230b-25: rnga mo la sogs pa'i spangs dang /
T02D1755:230b-27: bya rog la sogs pa'i sgro dang /
T02D1755:230b-32: rus pa'i phye ma la sogs pa gang rnyed pa rnams la /
T02D1755:230b-35: yang na thal ba dang sol ba dang phu ba
T02D1755:230b-36: ma la sogs pa rnams la bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan
T02D1755:230b-37: byas te dug la sogs pas spags pas rkang pa
T02D1755:230b-38: g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung nas rim gyis mtshon rnon pos
T02D1755:230b-39: bcad cing bsnun pa ni gsad spa'i sbyin sreg go
T02D1755:230b-40: // 'di ni rdzas kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D1755:230b-41: sbyin sreg gi shing srog chags med pa thab khung bas cung zad dma' ba'am //
T02D1755:230b-42: bas mtha'i lci ba nyi ba la'o //
T02D1755:230b-43: sngon du gsungs pa'i shing 'bras bu dang bcas pa rgyas pa la'o //
T02D1755:230b-44: nim pa'am shing ro skyur ba'am /
T02D1755:230b-45: shing gzhan me tog dang ldan pa rnams dbang la'o //
T02D1755:230b-48: tsher ma dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1755:230b-51: dur khrod nas byung ba rnams gang rung ngam /
T02D1755:230b-52: bong bu dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i spangs skam po rnams mngon spyod la'o //
T02D1755:230b-53: 'di ni bud shing gi mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D1755:230b-54: gser ram zangs sam mchod sbyin gyi shing las dgar gzar bya ste /
T02D1755:231a-0: de'i yu ba ni skyes bu cha [*tshad] @231a * //
T02D1755:231a-1: dang ldan pa'i sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
T02D1755:231a-2: rdo rje la sogs pa dang stabs cig longs spyod du mi btub pa'o //
T02D1755:231a-3: steng gi cha padma'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa can srid
T02D1755:231a-4: du sor brgyad pa shin tu mdzes pa la cha'i
T02D1755:231a-5: smad sor bzhi lham pa zabs su sor gnyis dang
T02D1755:231a-6: ldan pa'o // nang du rdo rje rtse gsum pa'am rtse lnga pas brgyan pa /
T02D1755:231a-7: bcud khung mtheb cung lto gang ba /
T02D1755:231a-8: de steng rdo rje rtse lnga pas spras pa /
T02D1755:231a-9: yu ba'i 'og gi cha rin po che rdo rjes brgyan pa'o //
T02D1755:231a-10: blugs gzar gyi yu ba'i 'og cha la yang de ltar go bar bya'o //
T02D1755:231a-12: yu ba dag dgang gzar srid du mnyam pa la
T02D1755:231a-13: phyed kyis phra ba kha la rgyar sor gnyis pa
T02D1755:231a-15: zabs su sor gcig dang ldan pa la rdo rje rtse lnga pa dgod do //
T02D1755:231a-16: dgang gzar dang blugs gzar med na lag pas dgang blugs dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1755:231a-17: 'di ni dgang gzar dang blags gzar gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D1755:231a-18: de nas khrus byas la gos gtsang ma dang rgyan
T02D1755:231a-19: dkar po btags nas dpal nag po chen po'i rnal
T02D1755:231a-20: 'byor dang ldan pas ngag bcad la /
T02D1755:231a-21: bde ba'i stan gyi steng du padma'i skyil mo krung bcas te /
T02D1755:231a-22: dkar po'i tshes gcig gi nub mo srid kyi dus
T02D1755:231a-23: su kha shar du bltas nas bsgrub bya dmigs te
T02D1755:231a-24: zhi ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas zhi ba'i las
T02D1755:231a-25: bya'o // de ltar gos la sogs pa gong las kha dog gi dbye bas shes par byas la /
T02D1755:231a-26: tshes bco lnga'i snga dro'i dus su lho ru bltas nas stan bzang por bsdad de /
T02D1755:231a-27: 'phang mtho ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas rgyas pa'i las bya'o //
T02D1755:231a-28: de ltar gos dmar po la sogs pa snga ma
T02D1755:231a-29: ltar byas la tshes brgyad kyi nam phyed kyi dus
T02D1755:231a-30: su nub tu bltas nas stan mthon po'i steng du
T02D1755:231a-31: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bsdad de /
T02D1755:231a-32: chags pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas dbang gi las bya'o //
T02D1755:231a-33: de ltar gos nag po la khrag gis spras pa dang /
T02D1755:231a-35: nag po'i dus gnyis gang rung cig gis nyi ma
T02D1755:231a-36: phyed dam nam phyed kyi dus su byang du kha
T02D1755:231a-37: bltas nas / stan spangs te mkhrang pa'i steng du bsgrub bya'i snying gar tsog tsog por gnas la /
T02D1755:231b-0: shin tu khro ba'i bsam pa dang ldan @231b pas so //
T02D1755:231b-1: mig bgrad khro gnyer bcas te /
T02D1755:231b-2: dkon mchog gsum la bya ba ma yin pa byed
T02D1755:231b-3: pa rnams thugs rje chen pos gsang pa'i don du
T02D1755:231b-4: bsgrub bya'i snying ga na gnas pa'i bsrung ba rnams
T02D1755:231b-5: h'um las spros pa'i rdo rje'i lcags kyus bkug nas
T02D1755:231b-6: rang gi sa bon la bstim /
T02D1755:231b-7: kho rang gi lha thams cad kyis kyang dor bar bsam mo //
T02D1755:231b-8: bsgrub bya'i sdig pa dang phral te sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1755:231b-9: zhing du bsgral bar 'dod pas mngon spyod kyi las
T02D1755:231b-10: bya'o // 'di ni sgrub pa po'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D1755:231b-11: gser dang dngul dang rdo dang zangs dang shing dang
T02D1755:231b-12: sa rnams la dung gi dbyibs su byas pa la'am
T02D1755:231b-13: / dung ngam sho ma'i snod du yon chab la sogs pa'i snod do //
T02D1755:231b-21: bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa rnams blugs nas rang
T02D1755:231b-22: 'dod pa'i lha'i sngags la sv'a h'a sbyar ba lan
T02D1755:231b-23: brgya bzlas pas zhi ba la'o //
T02D1755:231b-24: de ltar zho dang me tog ser po dang dri chab kha dog gis shes par bya /
T02D1755:231b-26: aom btags pas rgyas pa la'o //
T02D1755:231b-27: me tog dmar po dang dri chab la sogs pa gong dang 'dra /
T02D1755:231b-29: gyo mo dang 'dag pa'i snod la sogs par khrag
T02D1755:231b-30: dang lci ba dang ba lang gi gcin dang me
T02D1755:231b-31: tog dang dri kha dog nag po /
T02D1755:231b-32: dri med pa dri nga ba'i dri chab la sogs pa gong dang 'dra /
T02D1755:231b-33: phat btags pas mngon spyod la'o //
T02D1755:231b-34: 'di ni yon chab la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D1755:231b-35: zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang rnams kyi dbye bas las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas la /
T02D1755:231b-36: las thams cad pa'i chu snod dang yon chab la sogs pa g-yon du'o //
T02D1755:231b-37: de rnams kyi sngon du bzed zhal gsum gzhag go //
T02D1755:231b-38: bsang gtor gyis bsangs la sbyin sreg gi shing la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams g-yas phyogs su gzhag go //
T02D1755:231b-39: spros pa la dga' na rnam rgyal gyi bum pa dang /
T02D1755:231b-40: las thams cad pa'i bum pa'i lhag gnas ni dngos grub rin chen 'byung gnas ltar cho ga bya /
T02D1755:231b-41: spros pa la mi dga' na slob dpon la la dag gis bum pa gnyis pa mi 'dod do //
T02D1755:232a-1: su yon chab la sogs pa bzhag cing g-yon du rdzas rnams gzhag go //
T02D1755:232a-2: 'di ni rdzas rnams dgram pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D1755:232a-3: 'o ma can gyi shing las byung ba'i me zhi ba la'o //
T02D1755:232a-4: rgyal po dang rgyal rigs kyi khyim nas byung ba'am /
T02D1755:232a-6: rin po che las byung ba'am /
T02D1755:232a-7: dge 'dun gyi tshang mang las byung ba'i me rgyas pa la'o //
T02D1755:232a-8: rje rigs dang smad 'tshong ma'i khyim nas byung ba'i mes dbang la'o //
T02D1755:232a-12: rigs ngan gyi khyim las byung ba'i mes mngon spyod la'o //
T02D1755:232a-13: 'di ni me'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D1755:232a-14: de nas dngos grub rin chen 'byung gnas su bshad pa ltar gtor ma sbyin la /
T02D1755:232a-15: bsrung ba dang ldan pas snod du ma bzung ste /
T02D1755:232a-16: yi ge gsum gyi sngags bzlas so //
T02D1755:232a-17: de nas las thams cad pa'i sngags brjod cing mar mes me sngar ba dang /
T02D1755:232a-18: sngags de nyid brjod cing ba'i chus mngon spyod dang
T02D1755:232a-19: gzhan la g-yon dang g-yas su lan bdun bskor zhing
T02D1755:232a-21: thab khung du du ba dang bcas pa'am /
T02D1755:232a-22: du ba yang spangs pa gzhag ste /
T02D1755:232a-23: aom dzva la dzva la h'um zhes pas yang dag par sbar ba dang /
T02D1755:232a-24: 'khor la'i gtso bo'i snying po brjod cing /
T02D1755:232a-25: blugs gzar mar gyis bkang ste lan bdun gyis bskyar bar bya'o //
T02D1755:232a-26: mngon spyod la tsha ba'i mar gyis so //
T02D1755:232a-27: de nas ku sha rnams dgram pa ni /
T02D1755:232a-28: aom badzra satva aa:zhes pa brjod cing dang por ku
T02D1755:232a-29: sha gnyis sgrub pa po'i g-yon phyogs su shar du
T02D1755:232a-31: rim pa bzhin du lho phyogs su dang /
T02D1755:232a-32: nub phyogs dang byang phyogs rnams su bstan pa'o //
T02D1755:232a-33: thab khung du dbul ba ni shar du bstan pa'o //
T02D1755:232a-34: gzhan yang rgyas pa dang dbang dang mngon spyod rnams
T02D1755:232a-35: kyi thab la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin shar
T02D1755:232a-36: dang lho dang nub rnams su shes par bya'o //
T02D1755:232a-37: de nas lha'i rang bzhin la gnas pa'i rang gi
T02D1755:232a-38: sa bon gyi thab bskyed la sbar bar bltas nas
T02D1755:232a-39: der bdag med par bsams la /
T02D1755:232a-40: yi ge ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa'o //
T02D1755:232a-41: de'i steng du padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa
T02D1755:232a-42: sa bon yi ge ram las byung ba'i lto ba
T02D1755:232b-0: @232b 'phyang ba sha rgyas pa thung ba /
T02D1755:232b-1: zhal gsum pa zhal re re zhing spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa /
T02D1755:232b-2: phyag dang po gnyis kyis yum la 'khyud pa /
T02D1755:232b-3: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis kyis mi 'jigs pa dang bgrang 'phreng 'dzin pa /
T02D1755:232b-4: g-yon gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa /
T02D1755:232b-5: las kyi bye brag gi kha dog dang na bza'
T02D1755:232b-6: dang rgyan bsam pa'i bye brag dang 'od zer gyi
T02D1755:232b-7: 'phro 'du dang rgyas gdab rnams go bar bya'o //
T02D1755:232b-8: ral ba dang smra ra shin tu rgyas pa /
T02D1755:232b-9: sa bon ram dang bcas pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor gyis thugs kar spros pa'i me lha bsam nas /
T02D1755:232b-10: thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas /
T02D1755:232b-11: dam tshig pa dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes pa 'khor
T02D1755:232b-12: dang bcas pa me mtshams na gnas par bltas la
T02D1755:232b-14: aom ae hye hi mha'a bh'a ta de ba ri shi dvi dza sa ta ma /
T02D1755:232b-15: gri hi t'a hu ti ma h'a ram aa smin
T02D1755:232b-16: sanni hi to bha b'a zhes pas dgug ste bstim
T02D1755:232b-17: mo// de la aom a'a:h'um ram argham pra t'itstsha h'um zhes pa'am /
T02D1755:232b-18: aom a'a:h'um pra ba ra satk'a ram aargham pra t'itstsha
T02D1755:232b-19: h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa'i sngags kyis argham dbul lo
T02D1755:232b-20: // aargha'i gnas su p'atya la sogs pa bcug la /
T02D1755:232b-22: zhal bsil bsang gtor phul te /
T02D1755:232b-23: las kyi bye brag gi me tog la sogs pas mchod par bya'o //
T02D1755:232b-24: phyi nas lag pa g-yon pa byang chub mchog gi
T02D1755:232b-25: phyag rgya steng du kha phyogs pas mar gyis gang
T02D1755:232b-27: yang lag pa g-yas pa 'og tu kha phyogs pas
T02D1755:232b-28: mar gyis gang ba'i blugs gzar steng du kha phyogs
T02D1755:232b-29: par bzung ste / mngon spyod las gzhan par go bar bya'o //
T02D1755:232b-30: pus mo'i steng nas 'khyud pa bzhin pas dgang blugs
T02D1755:232b-31: g-yas dang g-yon du bskor zhing dgang blugs gsum mam
T02D1755:232b-33: me lha'i lce la ram bkod la /
T02D1755:232b-34: gsum po kha cung zad phye bar dbul /
T02D1755:232b-35: mngon spyod la kha shin tu gdangs par dbul ba ni /
T02D1755:232b-36: aom hi badzra phat rnams zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang mngon spyod rnams kyis dbye bas /
T02D1755:232b-37: aom na ma:sa manta bh'u ta n'am aagna ye sv'a h'a zhes pa'i sngags la rim pas sbyar ro //
T02D1755:232b-38: aom aagna ye sv'a h'a zhes pas sreg blugs kyi sngags so //
T02D1755:233a-0: @233a * // phyi nas me spra brtag pa ni kha dog gi
T02D1755:233a-1: dbye ba la sogs pas rim pa dang rim pa
T02D1755:233a-2: ma yin pas go bar byas la /
T02D1755:233a-5: las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis sreg blugs bdun byas te /
T02D1755:233a-6: phyi nas dgang blugs gsum phul la /
T02D1755:233a-7: blugs gzar la sogs pa lan gcig gam gsum mam bdun dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1755:233a-8: yam shing la sogs pa sbyang ba ni /
T02D1755:233a-9: aom a'a:h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa yam shing sbyang ba'i sngags so //
T02D1755:233a-10: aom shr'i sv'a h'a zhes pa mar sbyang ba'i sngags so //
T02D1755:233a-11: aom sv'a h'a zhes pas rdzas rnams bkru ba'i sngags so //
T02D1755:233a-12: aom dza sv'a h'a zhes pa 'bru rnams sbyang ba'i sngags so //
T02D1755:233a-13: aom ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a zhes pas rdzas gzhan rnams sbyang ba'i sngags so //
T02D1755:233a-14: 'dir bsreg pa'i go rims ni dang po me 'bar bzhin pa la yam shing bsreg go //
T02D1755:233a-15: de nas rim gyis mar dang /
T02D1755:233a-20: ku sha la sogs pa rang rang gis sngags kyis bsregs te /
T02D1755:233a-21: phyi nas zhal bsil dang bsang gtor byas la /
T02D1755:233a-22: me lha de 'bar ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa la sogs par bya'o //
T02D1755:233a-23: de nas yi ge h'um yig gis yang bsang gtor
T02D1755:233a-24: byas la zhi bar 'dod pas cho ga ji lta
T02D1755:233a-25: ba bzhin zhi bar bya ba ni 'od zer 'phro
T02D1755:233a-26: bzhin pa'i dpal nag po chen por bskyed la /
T02D1755:233a-27: phyag na zla ba chu shel gyi bum pa bdud
T02D1755:233a-28: rtsis bkang ba thogs te bsgrub bya la lha mos
T02D1755:233a-29: dbang bskur bas de'i rims nad la sogs pa zhi
T02D1755:233a-31: rgyas par 'dod pas rgyas par bya ba ni bsgrub
T02D1755:233a-32: bya'i bang mdzod du snga ma ltar gser gyi bum
T02D1755:233a-33: pa nas rin po che'i rgyun babs pas dbul pa
T02D1755:233a-35: dbang du bya bar 'dod pas snga ma ltar autpala
T02D1755:233a-36: kha zum pa lta bu'i mde'u dang ldan pa'i mda'
T02D1755:233a-37: snying gar spros nas dbang du bya'o //
T02D1755:233a-38: gsad par 'dod pas khro ba dang bcas te bsgrub
T02D1755:233a-39: bya'i steng du rdo rje'i me'i char pa phab nas
T02D1755:233a-40: de thal bar song bar bsam zhing gsad par bya'o
T02D1755:233a-41: // de nas mngon par rtogs pa cho ga ji
T02D1755:233a-42: lta ba bzhin du dam tshig ba bskyed pa dang
T02D1755:233a-43: ye shes pa gzhug pa dang /
T02D1755:233a-44: dbang bskur ba yan chad byas la /
T02D1755:233b-1: dri zhim po la sogs pa'i rang sngags dang /
T02D1755:233b-2: lha sngags rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs la mchod pa ni zhi pa la'o //
T02D1755:233b-3: de bzhin du me tog ser pos rgyas pa la shes par bya'o //
T02D1755:233b-5: drag po la dri mi zhim pa dang /
T02D1755:233b-6: dri med pa'i me tog dang dri'o //
T02D1755:233b-7: gu gul dkar pos spos so //
T02D1755:233b-8: mi dang nyal sogs pa'i zhag las mar me'o //
T02D1755:233b-9: cha ba dang kha ba la sogs pas lha bshos so //
T02D1755:233b-13: bsang gtor rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D1755:233b-14: lce las kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i kha dog dang
T02D1755:233b-15: ldan pa'i rdo rje rang gi sa bon gyis mtshan
T02D1755:233b-16: par bskyed la / rang gi sngags kyis snga ma bzhin /
T02D1755:233b-17: dgang blugs re re la mar la sogs pa'i rdzas thams cad kyi re re la /
T02D1755:233b-18: sreg blugs gsum gsum dbul lo //
T02D1755:233b-19: mar gyi sreg blugs gzhan pas mang bar bya'o //
T02D1755:233b-20: de nas rang gi sngags kyi bar du zhi ba la che ge mo sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1755:233b-21: rgyas pa la pushtim ku ru aom //
T02D1755:233b-22: dbang la wa sham ku ru ho:gsad pa la m'a ra ya phat dam /
T02D1755:233b-23: h'um h'um zhes pa rnams kyang ldan pa'am /
T02D1755:233b-24: rkyang par zlos bzhin pas zhi ba la sogs pa'i bsam pa dang bcas pas sreg blugs brgya'am /
T02D1755:233b-26: nus tshad bsreg pa'i sngags ni /
T02D1755:233b-27: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a zhes dang /
T02D1755:233b-28: til gyis zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1755:233b-29: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a zhes pa dang /
T02D1755:233b-30: d'ur bas tshe bsring bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1755:233b-31: aom badzra pushta ye sv'a h'a zhes pa dang /
T02D1755:233b-32: 'bras ma nyams pas rgyas par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1755:233b-33: aom sarba sam pa de sv'a h'a zhes pa dang /
T02D1755:233b-34: 'bras yos kyis phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1755:233b-35: aom aa pra ti ha ta te he badzr'a ya sv'a h'a zhes pa dang /
T02D1755:233b-36: til gyis brlan pa'i ku shas bsrung ba'i don du'o //
T02D1755:233b-37: aom ma h'a b'iry'a ya sv'a h'a zhes pa nas kyi'o //
T02D1755:233b-38: aom badzra gha sma r'i sv'a h'a zhes pa gro'i'o //
T02D1755:233b-39: rang rang gi lha'i sngags kyis rdzas gzhan rnams bsreg go //
T02D1755:233b-40: de ltar cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin sreg byas la /
T02D1755:233b-41: snying po'i sngags kyis gsum mam bdun nam nyi ma
T02D1755:233b-42: nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du mar gyi sreg
T02D1755:234a-9: me tog dang bcas pa'i thal mo snying gar sbyar te /
T02D1755:234a-10: chog mtshang ba la sogs pa'i skyon zhi bar byed ba'i don du /
T02D1755:234a-11: bdag ni rmongs pa'i blo yis dbang dag gis //
T02D1755:234a-12: gang dag cung zad ngan par bgyis pa rnams //
T02D1755:234a-13: mgon po khyod la bzod gsol de bgyis pas //
T02D1755:234a-14: sems can rnams kyi bskyab pa por gyur cing //
T02D1755:234a-15: ma thob par byas pa dang mi shes pas //
T02D1755:234a-16: ma gus pa yis gang byas gyis zhing bstod pa dang bcas pas so //
T02D1755:234a-17: yang zhal bsil de bsangs la yang dag par mchod la 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab /
T02D1755:234a-19: aom badzra satva aa:zhes cung zhig brjod nas yi ge brgya pa dang /
T02D1755:234a-20: aom tram to wa zhes pa la sogs pa brjod
T02D1755:234a-21: nas yi ge gsum gyi bar du rang gi snying
T02D1755:234a-22: po mu:dang bcas pa bcug la bzlas shing ye shes
T02D1755:234a-24: phyi nas me lha thab khung du spyan drangs la bsang gtor gyis bsangs la mchod pa dbul /
T02D1755:234a-25: zhal bsel nas ras gsar ba phul ba dang /
T02D1755:234a-26: rdzas lhag rnams bsreg pa ni dril bu dkrol zhing bstod pa dang bcas pas so //
T02D1755:234a-27: yang zhal bsil de bsangs la yang dag par mchod la 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab /
T02D1755:234a-29: aom badzra satva a'a:zhes pa brjod la snga ma ltar byas nas aom mu:zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1755:234a-30: de ltar nyi ma re re zhing gong du bshad pa ltar yan gsum mam bzhir bya'o //
T02D1755:234a-31: de nas me bsdu ba ni zhi ba la'o mas so //
T02D1755:234a-32: rgyas pa la chu ser pos so //
T02D1755:234a-34: gsad pa la khrag gis so //
T02D1755:234a-35: de nas thab khung gi thal ba dang sol ba
T02D1755:234a-36: las thams cad pa'i bum par blugs te chu bo
T02D1755:234a-38: 'dir ni lha ma nyes par bya ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o /
T02D1755:234a-40: // / spyin sreg cho ga byas pa 'di yis //
T02D1755:234a-41: dge ba dri med thob pa gang yin //
T02D1755:234a-42: des ni myur bar sems can thams cad //
T02D1755:234a-43: bde chen rdo rje sems dpar gyur cig / ye
T02D1755:234b-0: shes kyi me sbar ba zhes bya ba'i sbyin @234b
T02D1755:234b-3: // / pandi ta chen po sa manta shr'is mdzad pa'o //
T02D1755:234b-4: pandi ta de nyid dang lo ts'a ba dge slong
